scripts.start: nodemon --ignore var/ --ignore build/ --ignore coverage/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore tests/ --exec yarn ts-node index.ts -e ts,js,json,graphql
scripts.build:dev: tsc --build && copyfiles db/**/*.* graphql/**/**.graphql assets/**/*.* build/
scripts.build:prod: tsc --build && copyfiles db/**/*.* graphql/**/**.graphql assets/**/*.* build/
scripts.generate: graphql-codegen --config ./graphql/codegen.yml && npx prisma db pull --schema=./db/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=./db/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.initdbdock: docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS Packrat'" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < /app/scripts/Packrat.SCHEMA.sql" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < /app/scripts/Packrat.PROC.sql" && docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < /app/scripts/Packrat.DATA.sql"
scripts.dropdbdock: docker exec -i packrat-db sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Packrat'"
scripts.initdb: sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS Packrat'" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.SCHEMA.sql" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.PROC.sql" && sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=Packrat --default-character-set=utf8mb4 < ./db/sql/scripts/Packrat.DATA.sql"
scripts.dropdb: sh -c "exec mysql -u root -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS Packrat'"
scripts.reset: yarn dropdb && yarn initdb && rm -rf var/Storage && curl http://localhost:8983/solr/packrat/update --data "<delete><query>*:*</query></delete>" -H "Content-type:text/xml; charset=utf-8" && curl http://localhost:8983/solr/packrat/update --data "<commit/>" -H "Content-type:text/xml; charset=utf-8" && curl http://localhost:8983/solr/packratMeta/update --data "<delete><query>*:*</query></delete>" -H "Content-type:text/xml; charset=utf-8" && curl http://localhost:8983/solr/packratMeta/update --data "<commit/>" -H "Content-type:text/xml; charset=utf-8"
